reference.title: Operation
reference.shortdesc: How to apply power to the .

refsyn.note: The Power switch is recessed into the front of the to prevent accidental loss of power. Activate the switch with the eraser-end of a pencil or small tool of similar size.
refsyn.p: Apply power to the . Notice that when power is off, the end surface of the switch is white and when power is on, it changes to orange.
